Articles.Content: Okay im new on the forum but have been playing KSP for quite some time. First of all id like to say hello and second i have a question. So ive landed 2 crafts on minmus and 2 on mun and have an orbiter around both minmus and mun (as well as kerbin) my question is that with the latest planet implementation i find it quite tedious to continually go to the planets to supply bases and i had an idea of launching from minmus to clear kerbins gravity easily or better yet having a launch pad built on those other planets. (basically im asking if theres a mod or if there will be a mod or if its planned to add the ability to build launchpads on other worlds and moons) if there already is a mod please give me the link to it thanks!
Welcome Lunar! I'm not very familiar with the modding side of things here, but there is a great forum with all sorts of awesome people!

Welcome Lunar! I'm not very familiar with the modding side of things here, but there is a great forum with all sorts of awesome people!

Yeah i heard im real excited to be apart of it, i was just wondering if some mod existed that allowed the launch pad to be moved

Hi Lunar, welcome to the community

There is no way to relocate the launchpad yet, but what you can do is some careful editing of your persistence file.

Once you have a craft on a moon or in orbit, you can copy it's position data to another craft, it is worth keeping a separate file of these "paveway" craft so you don't lose them.

sit = LANDED

landed = True

landedAt =

splashed = False

met = 372245.316447311

lct = 2366.99999999814

root = 0

lat = -26.9476606842083

lon = 174.542602308098

alt = 1348.58028341862

hgt = 2.911647

nrm = -2.006159E-05,1,3.390881E-05

rot = 0.7332431,-0.405808,0.4599736,0.293426

CoM = -0.0001457706,-1.0163,-0.006355235

stg = 2

prst = False

eva = False

ORBIT

{

SMA = NaN

ECC = 1

INC = NaN

LPE = 158.131555115722

LAN = 213.573940788517

MNA = -8.40714670366795

EPH = 374614.436447311

REF = 2

OBJ = 0

}

You'll need to edit the stg value to match your craft, the example above is of a craft on the Mun, if you copy that data over the data of one of your rockets, it'll be on the Mun
